parameter.name: deviceId
parameter.label: Device ID
parameter.description: The device identifier identifies one certain speaker.

parameter.name: deviceName
parameter.label: Device Name
parameter.description: The device name of the speaker.

parameter.name: volumeStepSize
parameter.label: Volume Step Size
parameter.description: Step size to use if the volume is changed using the increase/decrease command.

channel-type.label: Clear Zone
channel-type.description: Remove the current speaker from the zone

channel-type.label: Control
channel-type.description: Control the AllPlay speaker, e.g. start/pause/next/previous/ffward/rewind

channel-type.label: Cover Art
channel-type.description: Cover art image of the track currently playing

channel-type.label: Cover Art URL
channel-type.description: Cover art URL of the track currently playing

channel-type.label: Current Album
channel-type.description: Album of the track currently playing

channel-type.label: Current Artist
channel-type.description: Artist of the track currently playing

channel-type.label: Current Duration
channel-type.description: Duration in seconds of the track currently playing

channel-type.label: Current Genre
channel-type.description: Genre of the track currently playing

channel-type.label: Current Title
channel-type.description: Title of the track currently playing

channel-type.label: Current User Data
channel-type.description: Custom user data (e.g. name of radio station) of the track currently playing

channel-type.label: Current URL
channel-type.description: URL of the track or radio station currently playing

channel-type.label: Input
channel-type.description: Current input of the speaker

channel-type.label: Loop Mode
channel-type.description: Loop mode of the speaker (ONE, ALL, NONE)

channel-type.label: Mute
channel-type.description: Set or get the mute state of the speaker

channel-type.label: State
channel-type.description: The State channel contains state of the Speaker, e.g. BUFFERING, PLAYING, STOPPED,...

channel-type.label: Shuffle Mode
channel-type.description: Toggle the shuffle mode of the speaker

channel-type.label: Stop
channel-type.description: Stop the current playback

channel-type.label: Stream URL
channel-type.description: Play the given HTTP or file stream (file:// or http://)

channel-type.label: Volume
channel-type.description: Set or get the master volume

channel-type.label: Volume Control
channel-type.description: Flag if the volume control is enabled (might be disabled if speaker is not master of the zone)

channel-type.label: Zone ID
channel-type.description: Id of the Zone the speaker belongs to

channel-type.label: Zone Members
channel-type.description: Comma-separated list of zone members of this (lead) speaker
